alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 11:51PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Litchfield and northeastern Dutchess Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1151 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Amenia, or 16 miles north of Sherman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Amenia, Sharon, Millerton, Falls Village, Cornwall Bridge, Dover Plains, Salisbury, Goshen, Cornwall, Smithfield, South Norfolk, West Torrington, South Canaan, Kelly Corner, West Goshen, Skiff Mountain, Wrightville, South Amenia and Shekomeko. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
